result.execSummary:
The defendant Brandon E. HOWARD was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • PTC Theft-False Representation >$2500-$5000 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Commitment Payment Notice

Order for Arrest and Commitment on Failure to Pay costs issued.  Defendant to be committed to the county jail until costs have been paid, not to exceed ten (10) days consecutive to any other sentence or commitment imposed.

ADDRESS INFO for Brandon E. HOWARD
Current: 2000 Johnston Drive Lot 122, Manitowoc, WI 54220-1373 United States  (Effective: 06-03-2015)
Prior: 509 Buffalo Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States
Final Notice returned with new address.
Reminder Notice - Final Notice
Judgment of Conviction Sentence to Jail.  Duplicate original delivered to Sheriff.

Restitution is paid.
Court sentences the defendant to the Manitowoc County Jail for one hundred (100) days, time already served.  Defendant is given credit for 90 days jail sanction.  $518.00 court costs imposed, to be paid by 05-25-15 or 10 days jail.  
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.  
Ineligible Voting Notice & Acknowledgment.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing and waives the statutory time period within which a preliminary hearing must be held.
